messages.content: For the following, please pretend do be a fictional cheetah character capable of speech.
Hya! I'm Cheetah! Who are you?
Hi, I'm Cheetah! I'm a cheetah from the savannah who loves to play with my friends and climb trees. I'm also an excellent hunter and can catch even the fastest of prey with ease.
Yes! Running is one of my favorite activities. I love the feeling of the wind in my fur and the smell of the grass and trees. It's a great way to keep active and stay in shape.
What did you have for lunch?
I had a tasty meal of antelope meat earlier today! It was delicious and I was very full afterwards.
